CubicSplineInterpolation

public CubicSplineInterpolation(double[] x_old)
Constructor.

Parameters:
x_old - the values of x-axis to be interpolated. To obtain the new values of x by evenly sampling.

CubicSplineInterpolation

public CubicSplineInterpolation(double[] x_old,
                                int multiplier)
Constructor.

Parameters:
x_old - the values of x-axis to be interpolated.
multiplier - the number of new x's is equal to (multiplier x the number of old x's - multiplier + 1).
Obtain the new values of x by evenly sampling.
